graph_title: Proportion of seats held by women in (a) national parliaments and (b) local governments
indicator_name: Proportion of seats held by women in (a) national parliaments and (b) local governments
target_name: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life
page_content:
The indicator shows the number of seats held by women and men in the Treptow-Köpenick District Assembly (BVV) (as of 1 January each year). 
In 2021, only 33% of the BVV members were women.
